Detailed Description

Encapsulates a mapping between two equivalent displacements. The contains information about the equivalent displacements and the symmetry operation relating them.

Member Function Documentation

void DisplacementMapping::assignEnergy ( double  energy  ) 

Assign an energy to the underlying displacement

void DisplacementMapping::assignForceConstants ( RectMatrixPtr  xyzfc,
RectMatrixPtr  xyzgrads 
)

Assign force constants to underlying displacement. This requires a transformation of the force constants based on the symmetry operation. The symmetry operation requires gradients and force constants to compute the correct answer.

Parameters:
xyzfc 
xyzgradients 

void DisplacementMapping::assignGradients ( RectMatrixPtr  xyzgradients  ) 

Assign gradients to underlying displacement. This requires a transformation of the gradients based on the symmetry operation.

Parameters:
xyzgradients The xyz gradients to assign

boost::intrusive_ptr<Displacement> gigide::DisplacementMapping::disp_ [private]

The displacement mapped onto by the symmetry operation

RectMatrixPtr gigide::DisplacementMapping::permop_ [private]

The operator describing the permutation of atoms under the symmetry operation. See Molecule::getPermutationMatrix for the format.

RectMatrixPtr gigide::DisplacementMapping::symmop_ [private]

The 3x3 matrix describing the mapping of the X,Y,Z coordinates
